author: K K Rebecca Lai, K K Rebecca Lai
title: Coronavirus cases spike in Hong Kong, Singapore and Taiwan
description: Hong Kong and Taiwan each had one tour group that separately visited Egypt, where multiple travellers developed coronavirus symptoms and fell ill after they returned in early March
content: Hong Kong, Singapore and Taiwan once heralded for early successes in battling the pandemic are now confronting a new wave of coronavirus cases, largely fuelled by infections coming from elsewhere. Singapore is also seeing a rise in local transmissions, with m… [+3629 chars]
